resources.string: Welcome to WAW Tour! Here you will find information about unforgettable places in the capital of Poland!
Old Town- The place where history and joy grab their hands and create a beautiful universe. Once you make your first step on its grounds, you will never want to leave.
Centrum Nauki Copernic- Have you ever wanted to go beyond the secrets of the world? Now, you can try anything you want, only at Centrum Nauki Copernic.
Park ≈Åazienki- If you are seeking for nature, peace and getting out of daily life, definetely this park is for you.
Manekin- If you come to Warsaw, you must go to the Master of Pancakes: Manekin. A wide variety of pancakes is waiting just for you.
List of attractions in Old Town
